messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need BSA-84 Artillery  please get on it staff

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are looking for a HOS, if you are interested in this position please come to the HOP line.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HOP line is open again for the application of HOS

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a horde of energy draining parasites have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The chef is making great corgi burgers, feel free to try one of them out

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Fucking Faggots, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.
